name: Introverts in Silence
description:
Welcome to Introverts in Silence

The plot is centered on two characters, Perkin and Saga. They are both trying overcome difficult times in their lives, however, one of them is given a second chance to rediscover the meaning of life after a tragic event.

This is my first visual novel. I would appreciate any type of feedback. <3

Changelog: Version 0.2:
  • Fixed resolution problems on some monitors.
  • Added a volume slider.
Version 0.1:
  • Initial Release.

Note: The game covers topics such as Mental Health, Death, and Suicide.
